<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Effortless Captivation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3365) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 121</row>

**Archetype** [Captivator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=125)

**Prerequisites**
[Captivator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3358)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins.

</column>

---

You maintain your innate [enchantments](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) and [illusions](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) with hardly a thought. You immediately gain the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, which you can use only to extend the duration of an enchantment or illusion spell.
name: Effortless Captivation
